amendment.description: An amendment numbered 38 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to ensure that none of the funds made available by this Act may be used to implement, administer, or enforce Executive Order 14008 titled "Tackling the Climate Crisis at Home and Abroad" (January 27, 2021) or any rule or regulation to implement such Order.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barr amendment (A016) Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 210 (Roll no. 630).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Barr amendment (A016) Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 210 (Roll no. 630).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Barr amendment (A016) Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 210 (Roll no. 630).
